list.expr: group by (container, alertname) (ALERTS{namespace="$namespace", container=~".+", tier="", alertstate="firing"})
list.name: Alerts

targets.expr: avg(kafka_consumer_coordinator_commit_latency_avg{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod", spring_id=~"$topic.consumer..*"} > 0)
sum(kafka_consumer_coordinator_commit_latency_avg{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod", spring_id=~"$topic.consumer..*"})
sum(kafka_consumer_coordinator_commit_rate{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", spring_id=~"$topic.consumer..*"})
sum(kafka_consumer_coordinator_join_rate{namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod", spring_id=~"$topic.consumer..*"})
sum by (container, topic) (kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_records_lag{ namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod", topic=~"$topic"})
sum by (container, topic) (irate(kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_bytes_consumed_rate{ namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod", topic=~"$topic"}[$period]))
avg by (container, topic) (kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_records_per_request_avg{ namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod", topic=~"$topic"})
sum by (container, topic) (kafka_consumer_fetch_manager_records_lead{ namespace=~"$namespace", container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod", topic=~"$topic"})

panels.title: Coordinator Failed Rebalance Rate per Hour [$period]

panels.description: Number of times the I/O layer checked for new I/O to perform per second.
panels.title: Select Rate [$period]
